title: Cannot rewrite the rip even after disabling all the security features
content:
I was trying to exploit a simple buffer overflow on a self created binary. i have disabled all the security features by compiling with the flags - --fno-stack-protector -z execstack -no-pie. my program just copied data through gets on a defined variable. however when i try to overwrite the RIP and check the crash point, i get this -

what can i do to overwrite the rip?

comments.text: Hello and welcome to RE.SE! Please be more verbose. Paste your crash context - location, regs, stack under gdb - in text. Attaching the binary would be great ofc.
from your RIP (0x41414141415d) that you've managed to overwrite rip.
But shouldnt it be 0x414141414141 as i had only put A's
Can you just share program binary if it is ok?
